text: Legionäre is the second solo album by Michael Cretu. It was released in 1983. Cretu sings on several tracks, with lyrics in German. The album was co- produced and supervised by Harald Steinhauer, and mastered by Armand Volker. The English edition is titled Legionnaires. ==Track listing== ===Legionäre (German edition)=== #"Legionäre" - 1:40 #"Total Normal" - 3:55 #"Spiel Auf Zeit" - 3:53 #"Frau Aus Stein" - 4:54 #"Goldene Jahre" - 3:23 #"Zeitlose Reise" - 3:23 #"Data-Alpha-4" - 3:27 #"Karawanen" - 3:36 #"Der Planet Der Verlorenen Zeit" - 5:54 ===Legionnaires (English edition)=== #"Legionnaires" - 1:43 #"Today, Today" - 3:55 #"I Obey" - 3:54 #"Am I Alone" - 4:53 #"The Time of Our Lives" - 3:23 #"Targets" - 3:26 #"Mission Unaccomplished" - 3:29 #"Nebulae" - 3:41 #"We Look to the Stars" - 5:50 ==References== Category:1983 albums Category:Michael Cretu albums Category:Virgin Records albums es:Legionäre
